Package shared

Interface IVehicle

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Vehicle
    public interface IVehicle
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface defines the structure of a vehicle. A vehicle is defined by : - a unique identifier - its make - its model - its year - its seating capacity - its fuel type - its transmission - its price in Euros - some notes given by the renters - some comments given by the renters

      Returns a String to display a vehicle using its attributes.

      Getter for the unique identifier of the vehicle

      Getter for the "model" attribute of the vehicle.

      • returnCar

        void returnCar​(int note,
               java.lang.String condition)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called when a car is returned from rental. The renter can specify a note and a comment on the condition of return.
        Parameters:
        note - the note specified by the renter (from 0 to 10).
        condition - a message to specify the condition of the vehicle when returning it.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - may occur as this object will be used in remote method call.
